protocol.name: P-GSE43947-1
protocol.text: The scanned data were extracted through Affymetrix Command Console 1.1 software to generate raw CEL files. Expression data were generated from the CEL files using MAS5.0 algorithm in Affymetrix Expression Console 1.2 software. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL =  DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE43947-2
protocol.text: Rosette leaves were frozen immediately after detachment and ground in liquid nitrogen to fine powder.

protocol.name: P-GSE43947-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown in a growth chamber with a 16-h photoperiod at 22/18oC (day/night).

protocol.name: P-GSE43947-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from the leaf powder using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the supplier’s recommendation Kit (Qiagen, Chatsworth, CA, USA) according to the supplier’s recommendation. For complete DNA removal, RNase-Free DNase Set (Qiagen, Chatsworth, CA, USA) provided efficient on-column digestion Total RNA was extracted from leaves using RNeasy Plant Mini Kit

protocol.name: P-GSE43947-5
protocol.text: Conversion of RNA into ds cDNA and generation of biotin-labeled cRNA from the ds cDNA were performed as recommended by the Affymetrix GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE43947-6
protocol.text: Hybridization, washing, and staining of the biotin-labeled cRNA with GeneChip® Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array were performed as recommended by the Affymetrix GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE43947-7
protocol.text: GeneChip arrays were scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip® Scanner 3000 7G.
